content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of a stone furnace entity at position (0.0, 0.0) with a furnace source and result.
### Burner Mining Drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill entity at position (41.0, -82.0) with a coal source.
### Wooden Chest at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of a wooden chest entity at position (40.5, -83.5) with an empty inventory.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure you are close enough to the target position before attempting to place an entity, the maximum distance is 10 units.
### Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles
- Make sure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
### Errors when harvesting without being in range
- Move to the target resource before attempting to harvest it, ensure you are within range to harvest.
### Errors when crafting items with missing sub-ingredients
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item, some resources like wood must be gathered first.
